text: Beverly Hills Madam (also known as Ladies of the Night) is a 1986 American television drama movie directed by Harvey Hart and starring Faye Dunaway, Melody Anderson, Donna Dixon, Terry Farrell, Louis Jourdan, Seymour Cassel. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:American drama movies
title: Beverly Hills Madam
